Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Attic black-glazed pottery dinos; glazed throughout, interior streakily; exterior: inscription on top of flat rim.
Curator's comments: Joins 1886,0401.680; see also 1886.4-1.677 and 679. 1965,0930.511 and 512 are almost certainly from the same pot. For the attribution to an Attic workshop see U. Schlotzhauer, ‘Griechen in der Fremde: wer weihte in den Filialheiligtümern der Samier und Milesier in Naukratis?’ in A. Naso (ed.) Stranieri e non cittadini nei santuari greci, Florence 2006, 292-324, esp. 294-301.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 218)
Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 261, no. 2)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 661, no. 179, pl. 28.1)
Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (p. 55, Table 1, Nauk 43)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1199)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Phanes, Son of Glaukos
